CustomField.description: Controls audit trail creation for AI agent executions. This setting affects how much execution data is persisted for tracking, debugging, and storyboard visualization.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Controls audit trail depth for AI agent executions: • None: No audit records (maximum performance, no tracking) • Standard: Execution + Steps with token metrics (recommended for production) • Full: Complete audit trail including decision steps for storyboard visualization (default)
CustomField.label: Audit Level
